command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.ipConfigurations" options="ip-configurations" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnAuthenticationTypes" options="vpn-auth-type" group="">

help.short: The AADAudience ID of the VirtualNetworkGateway.
The AAD Issuer URI of the VirtualNetworkGateway.
The AAD Tenant URI of the VirtualNetworkGateway.
Autonomous System Number to use for the BGP settings.
IP address to use for BGP peering.
Weight (0-100) added to routes learned through BGP peering.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.bgpSettings.bgpPeeringAddresses" options="bgp-peering-addresses" hide="True" group="BgpSettings">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.bgpSettings.bgpPeeringAddresses[].customBgpIpAddresses" options="custom-bgp-ip-addresses">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.identity.userAssigned" options="mi-user-assigned user-assigned" group="Identity">

<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.natRules" options="nat-rules" group="Nat Rule" singularOptions="nat-rule">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.natRules[].properties.externalMappings" options="external-mappings-ip" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.natRules[].properties.internalMappings" options="internal-mappings-ip" group="Properties">

<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups" options="virtual-network-gateway-policy-groups" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups[].properties.policyMembers" options="policy-members" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRootCertificates" options="vpn-client-root-certificates" group="Root Cert Authentication">

<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRoutes.addressPrefixes" options="custom-routes" group="VPN Client">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientAddressPool.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes" group="VPN Client" singularOptions="address-prefix">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientProtocols" options="client-protocol" group="VPN Client">

<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.radiusServers" options="radius-servers" hide="True" group="VpnClientConfiguration">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vngClientConnectionConfigurations" options="vng-client-connection-configurations" hide="True" group="VpnClientConfiguration">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vngClientConnectionConfigurations[].properties.virtualNetworkGatewayPolicyGroups" options="virtual-network-gateway-policy-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@AddressSpace_create.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientIpsecPolicies" options="vpn-client-ipsec-policies" hide="True" group="VpnClientConfiguration">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRevokedCertificates" options="vpn-client-revoked-certificates" hide="True" group="VpnClientConfiguration">

json.schema:
<userAssigned action="create" type="array" name="userAssigned" arg="$parameters.identity.userAssigned">

<prop type="array" name="internalMappings" arg="$parameters.properties.natRules[].properties.internalMappings">

<prop type="array" name="vpnClientIpsecPolicies" arg="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientIpsecPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="vpnClientProtocols" arg="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientProtocols">
<prop type="array" name="vpnClientRevokedCertificates" arg="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRevokedCertificates">
<prop type="array" name="vpnClientRootCertificates" arg="$parameters.properties.vpnClientConfiguration.vpnClientRootCertificates">

help.short: The AADAudience ID of the VirtualNetworkGateway.

help.short: The type of identity used for the resource. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user assigned identities. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the virtual machine.

The list of user identities associated with resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

The type of NAT rule for VPN NAT.
